---
title: "Main Page"
---

This page contains links to some introductory presentations on R. The
presentations were created with the
[revealjs](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/revealjs_presentation_format.html)
format for R Markdown. The associated Stash repository with the source files is
hosted
[here](https://hdp-service.uk.kworld.kpmg.com/stash/projects/JL/repos/r-training/browse).

## Sections

```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
library(magrittr)
html <- dir(".", pattern = "[0-9].*.html")
links <- paste0("./", html)
labels <- html %>% 
  stringr::str_replace_all("[0-9]|.html", "") %>% 
  stringr::str_replace_all("-", " ") %>% 
  stringr::str_trim() %>% 
  stringr::str_to_title() %>% 
  stringr::str_replace_all("Ggplot", "ggplot")


cat(
  paste0("1. [", labels, "](", links, ")\n")
)
```
